Entries.choseFarming: pause 500/question fork0 "#ดินในหุบเขานี้ เพอร์เฟ็คกับการปลูกผักให้รสชาติดีล่ะ#อากาศและหญ้าของหุบเขานี้ เหมาะเลี้ยงสัตว์ที่สุดเลย"/fork choseAnimals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "ว่าไงจ๊ะ วินเซนท์?"/speak Vincent "อ่า พี่ชาวไร่ @ ฮะ? ถ้าผมกินผักของพี่ ผมจะโตมาแข็งแรง แบบพี่แซมของผมมั้ยฮะ?#$b#เขาแข็งแรงมากเลย ผมเห็นเขายกครูเพนนี ลอยเลยเมื่อคืนตอนที่พวกเขา ปีนต้นไม้กันน่ะฮะ$h"/showFrame Penny 27/jump Penny/pause 800/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/emote Penny 12/speak Penny "วินเซนท์! การนินทามันไม่ดีนะจ๊ะ!$a"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd/
Entries.choseAnimals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "ว่าไงจ๊ะ วินเซนท์?"/speak Vincent "พี่ชาวไร่ @ ฮะ? ผมเอาอานไปขี่หลัง วัวของพี่สักตัว เข้าเมืองได้มั้ยฮะ? ผมอยากเป็นคาวบอยฮะ!"/speak Penny "วินเซนท์! ทำตัวดีๆ สิจ๊ะ ฟาร์มของ @ เป็นที่ทำงาน ไม่ใช่ที่เล่นนะจ๊ะ$h"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
Entries.choseMinerals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "ว่าไงจ๊ะ วินเซนท์?"/speak Vincent "พี่ชาวไร่ @ ฮะ? จริงมั้ยฮะว่าในถ้ำลึกๆ มีก็อบลินอยู่... แล้วพวกมันก็ชอบจับ พวกเด็กผู้หญิงกิน เป็นอาหารเย็นน่ะฮะ?"/jump Jas/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 3/emote Jas 28/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/speak Penny "วินเซนท์! เธอกำลังทำให้แจสกลัวนะจ๊ะ อย่าพูดถึงมอนสเตอร์เลย$a"/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection Jas 0/emote Penny 12/pause 400/stopAnimation farmer/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
Entries.fieldTripEnd: pause 400/emote Penny 40/speak Penny "เอาล่ะ น่าจะพอแล้วสำหรับวันนี้ เธอสองคนไปวิ่งเล่นได้จ่ะ"/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 3 1/speed Jas 4/move Jas 9 0 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/jump Vincent/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 0 3 1 false/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 9 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 2/faceDirection Jas 2/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "ดูแลเด็ฏๆ พวกนี้น่ะเหนื่อยมากเลย...$u#$b#แต่ฉันก็ไม่ถือนะคะ ฉันชอบเห็นพวกเขาเรียนรู้... แล้วก็หวังว่าฉันจะช่วยให้พวกเขา โตเป็นคนดีได้"/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/speak Penny "$q -1 null#คุณเคยอยากเป็น พ่อแม่คนมั้ยคะ @?#$r -1 0 event_speaker_kids1#ฉันยังไม่เคยคิดถึงเรื่องนั้นน่ะ#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids2#แน่นอนสิ ฉันอยากมีครอบครัวใหญ่ๆ#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids3#คงงั้นมั้ง มันเป็นแรงขับตามเรื่องธรรมชาตินี่นะ#$r -1 10 event_speaker_kids4#ไม่ล่ะ ฉันว่าฉันคงเป็นได้ไม่ดีหรอก#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids5#ไม่ล่ะ แค่นี้คนก็ล้นโลกแล้ว#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids6#ไม่ล่ะ ฉันไม่อยากถูกผูกติดกับครอบครัวน่ะ"/viewport move 1 0 10000/pause 7000/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/speak Penny "แต่ก็ ดีใจที่คุณมานะคะ @ ฉันคิดว่าเด็กๆ ได้มีเวลาที่ดีมากเลยล่ะค่ะ$h"/end dialogue Penny "ขอบคุณที่ทำให้ ทัศนศึกษาของฉันวันนี้ ประสบความสำเร็จนะคะ"

Entries.Thu10: When I was younger, I always thought one day I'd marry Sam. We barely even spend time together anymore, though.#$e#I think we're just at different stages of our lives now.$h
Entries.Sat10: I was thinking today that the romance novels I read as a kid misled me in some ways.$u#$e#They gave the impression that affection... intimacy... mutual commitment beyond a certain point is reserved for romantic relationships.$u#$e#But now I know that isn't true. Even though we don't have those kinds of feelings for each other, I still care about you as deeply as I would if we were dating.#$e#I'm realizing that the difference between romance and friendship isn't one of degree, just form. Do you think so too?
Entries.Sun10: It's so embarrassing. I keep spacing out in the middle of teaching lessons.#$e#I get caught up thinking about all the stories I want to tell next time I see you. You won't believe what Vincent did the other day... $h
Entries.summer_Wed10: @! Oh, hi!#$e#It's unusually hot today, isn't it? How about you catch me up on your day to take my mind off it?$h
Entries.fall_Tue10: I walked by your farm the other evening as I dropped off Jas at her home. I saw you in the distance, and...#$b#...the landscape was beautiful, but my favorite part was how serene you looked. Like you were exactly where you wanted to be.
Entries.fall_Thu10: Vincent asked yesterday if I was in love with you. I think he's a little jealous.$h#$e#I explained that adults have all different kinds of relationships, and that 'love' and 'in love' aren't always the same thing.#$e#I think he understood. He's bright in certain ways.
Entries.winter_Mon10: I was reading before bed last night, but I only got through a couple chapters.#$e#I kept thinking, 'I have to tell @ about this part,' and then I'd be picturing how I'd explain it instead of reading the next part!$h
Entries.winter_Tue10: With the Feast of the Winter Star approaching, I was counting my blessings.#$b#I'm very thankful to have gotten to know you, @.
Entries.winter_Thu10: Oh, hi @.#$e#Sorry, I didn't sleep much last night. I was up late reading.$u#$e#Oh, um... Since you ask, it was an anthology themed around platonic partnerships. It just seemed interesting.$h
Entries.winter_Sun10: Sometime soon, we should go back to my place in the evening and cozy up together with a book.$h#$e#If you can make it, just try to show up before 8. I don't want my mom to come home early and make you feel unwelcome.

Entries.Rainy_Day_2: #$c .5#Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! I did some shopping this morning and got this for you.[186 180 770 535]#Oh right! I picked this up yesterday, but I forgot about it.[186 180 770 535] I thought you could use one of these.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Hmm... maybe I should experiment with a new recipe. You liked the last recipe I made, didn't you, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}?#$e#What was it called... 'Chili de @'?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: #$c .5#How was your day, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}? I spent my afternoon reading a novel.#I know some people find fulfillment, reading between the lines of a book for a deeper meaning. Me, I just find joy in the story itself.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: #$c .5#I'm sure Mom's at the saloon right now... But I don't feel so bad about it anymore. It's out of my hands.#Has my mother been nice to you lately? You and I are family now, so I guess that makes you her family too.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: #$c .5#I was just thinking about that night I asked you to be my future children's godparent. To think we ended up as {{RelationshipLabel}}!#Hm, I didn't finish all the grading I'd hoped. Maybe I can wing it first thing in the morning.$s
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: #$c .5#Was I shy when we first met? It's funny to think about, now that we've come so far.$h#Just wanted to say, you look great this morning. I hope that's a confidence booster!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: #$c .5#Good evening, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Did you accomplish everything you wanted to today? If not, that's okay. We've got all the time in the world!#When the light's dim, your eyes glimmer like reflected fireflies. It feels like one more way that you're connected to the valley.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: #$c .5#Hmm... skirt or pants tomorrow? Oh, who am I kidding... I always go with the skirt.#So this is my happily ever after! Not exactly the traditional kind, but I always liked stories that put a new spin on the classics.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: #$c .5#We should always try and remember those less fortunate than us. I'm just very grateful for what we have.#Phew. Did I mention? Over the last week, Vincent's been peppering me with little kid questions about us being {{RelationshipLabel}}.
Entries.Outdoor_0: I only ever dreamed of living in such a beautiful place, and now it's come true.#$e#$c .5#I realize how much I was missing before you moved into town.#I was so miserable back home.$s
Entries.Outdoor_1: #$c .5#Isn't this a perfect place to raise children? I would've been so happy growing up on a farm.#I understand that you have to get straight to work, hon. Will you be home early tonight, though?
Entries.Outdoor_2: #$c .5#Hey. Are you going to be shipping anything unusual today?#Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: #$c .5#A nice house, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. We're so very fortunate.#With the way I grew up, I never really thought I'd amount to much. But seeing our children like this makes me feel so lucky.
Entries.fall_19: I got to catch up with Maru yesterday. She's just as good a friend as ever.$h

Entries.winter_Tue8_inlaw_Penny: I'm glad things worked out for you and Penny! I always thought she deserved a friend like you.$h

Entries.Tue8_inlaw_Penny: It's so cool how you're {{RelationshipLabel}} with my teacher.#$e#I never thought that would have happened!

Entries.Tue6_inlaw_Penny: Penny used to talk about you all the time.#$b#She still does! You two really have a special connection.$l

Entries.marriage_spot2: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Finished at the farm?#$b#Come stay with me for a little longer, then.
Entries.marriage_museum2: It's quite soothing in here isn't it?#$b#We should find a book we're both interested in and read it together.$h
Entries.marriage_museum3: Oh, no! Look at you you're all soaked!$s#$b#Stay here a while and dry off, won't you?
Entries.marriage_r: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! Want to join me?$h#$b#Don't worry, I have some extra books for you.
Entries.marriage_r2: It's hard focusing on my book when you're here. I want to tell you all about it instead of actually reading it!$h
Entries.marriage_doctorextra: Oh, hi {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Let's talk after, I don't want to interrupt Dr. Harvey.
Entries.marriage_13: Jas and Vincent painted some pretty eggs. They should be easy to spot.$h#$b#I'm rooting for you! But um... go easy on the kids?
Entries.marriage_16: Good luck on your display, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. I'm still waiting for the spinning wheel to get set up.#$b#I'll earn us some tokens, don't worry.$h#$b#Unless I get banned again like last year.$s
Entries.marriage_25: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. I didn't want to enter without you.$h#$b#The snow's lovely at least, I should spend more time out here.
